doc.title: Bedelia and the Witch
doc.plot: Bedelia got a notion that she would do the family washing at night. We see her at the wash tub when the milkman comes in with bottles of milk. Then they make love to each other. Bedelia resumes her work. A witch appears riding a broom, but disappears shortly. Next Bedelia's tub vanishes, and a series of mystifying happenings bewilder her.
